text: Gösta Fredrik Gahm (7 July 1942 – 27 December 2020) was a Swedish astronomer. == Early life and career == Gahm was born in Stockholm. He was the professor emeritus of astronomy at Stockholm University. Until 2010, he was the chairman of the Swedish Astronomical Society. He was the main initiator of the popular science project Sweden Solar System. == Legacy == 10997 Gahm, a main-belt asteroid discovered on 2 September 1978, is named in honor of Gahm. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Scientists from Stockholm Category:Astronomers
title: Gösta Gahm
